name: Pincode based product price woocommerce
author: LetsCMS Pvt. Ltd

sections.description:
Pincode Based Product Price Woocommerce allows you to sell the same product in multiple price based on the pincode/zipcode of the customer.

Requirements

WooCommerce 2.6.0 or later.

Free Features Of This Plugin

  • You Can add unlimitad postcodes for one product
  • You Can update your postcode
  • Price will change according to pincode
  • Add your costum price in product section
  • show error on checkout when pincode is diffrent from choosen pincode
  • You can update your pincode at the time of cheackout

WooCommerce 2.6.0 or later.

Features of PINCODE/ZIPCODE BASED PRODUCT PRICE WOOCOMMERCE

  • Dynamic Pricing:Prices change dynamically based on the PIN code entered by the user. This feature allows for personalized pricing depending on the delivery location.
  • PIN Code Validation:The system validates the entered PIN code against a predefined database or list to ensure accuracy and availability of services to that location.
  • Customization:Store owners can set different prices for products or shipping based on various PIN codes or regions, reflecting diverse shipping costs or tax rates.
  • User-Friendly Interface:Integrating an intuitive interface where customers can easily input their PIN code to view accurate product prices or shipping charges for their location.
  • Database Management: Management of a comprehensive database containing various PIN codes, associated regions, and corresponding pricing structures for efficient calculations.
  • Compatibility and Integration: Integration of this feature with WooCommerce seamlessly, ensuring compatibility with the existing e-commerce platform and its functionalities.
  • Shipping and Tax Calculations: Adjustments in shipping rates and tax calculations based on the entered PIN code, providing accurate cost estimations to customers.
  • Conditional Logic: Applying conditional rules or logic to offer discounts, promotions, or special pricing based on specific PIN codes or regions.
    To implement this feature, you might require a WooCommerce plugin or custom development that integrates this functionality into your e-commerce platform, allowing you to manage and adjust prices based on PIN code inputs from customers. Several plugins or custom development solutions are available to achieve this functionality within WooCommerce.

Pro version Demo Link

Here’s a DEMO link to PINCODE/ZIPCODE BASED PRODUCT PRICE WOOCOMMERCE Pro Version .

Free Supports

Please share your issues/feedback with us, if you are facing any while using our plugin, at letscmsdev@gmail.com

Support: 24X7
sections.installation:
1. Download, install and activate the plugin.
  2. Go to Products -> Add/Edit Product
  3. Inside Product Pincode price metabox , you assign the price.
